Animal Name: American Bison 
Scientific Name: Bison bison 
IUCN Conservation Status: Near Threatened
Habitats: Open grasslands and woodlands 
Countries: United States 
Summary: The American Bison is a species that is native to North America. They are a part of the bovine family, which also includes cattle and goats. There were once millions of them across the continent, but their populations have declined drastically in recent years2.
